metadata.title: CVE-2022-28693 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Unprotected alternative channel of return branch target prediction insome Intel(R) Processors may allow an authorized user to potentiallyenable information disclosure via local access. Alternative form ofreturn branch target prediction in some Intel(R) Processors may allowan authorized user to potentially enable information disclosure vialocal access..RSBA behavior allows alternate branch predictors to be used bynear RET instructions when the RSB is empty. When eIBRS is enabled,the predicted target of these alternate predictors are restrictedto those belonging to the indirect branch predictor entries of thecurrent prediction domain.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').

linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
